1.content:
Sofia Verhman
-A young, naive girl out on her first quest. She has a sense of hero worship about high-ranking adventurers, and would never question anything they tell her. Long, blonde hair, and a short stature. She is somewhat plump, a step beyond puppy-fat. Her specialty is healing magic. Actually, she can only use healing magic. Surely she'll learn more, right?

Leone Sandrovic
-Leone has the experience of adventuring with a high level party. She was forced out for unexplained reasons, although likely due to her inability to handle money, and has been waiting around in the guild hall for months, waiting for an oppourtinity to get out there again. Tall, with jet balck hair and an impressive bust. Her recent bout of inactivity has lead to a fair ammount fo weight piling on, giving her a definite gut. Specializes in buffs and debuffs

-Marissa von Howerton
Marissa is a grade A prodigy, capable of feats far beyond her experience level. Despite this, and her family's connections, no party has managed to last more than a single job. Her demanding attitude, superiority complex, and general laziness make her a complete nightmare to have one a long journey. An average stature, with pure white hair. Outright fat, with a double rolled belly and no hint of muscle. Can use everything, healing, buffs, debuffs, and any other support magic
1.title: Chosse your healer!

12.content:
Johan wiped the sweat from his brow as he crested the top of the slope. The hot sun blazed down on him, glinting off of his armour. The top of the mountain pass offered little cover from the heat, nothing more than sandy ground and a few small brown rocks sticking out. Johan grabbed his waterskin and took a long gulp.

"Ah! That hit the spot. You want some Leone? Leone?"

Looking back towards his compatriot, she was nowhere to be found. Taking a few steps back, he peered down the slope. There, about fifty meters down, he saw her.

The time away from the field had not been kind to Leone. What was once a toned body, fit for being in the thick of the action, had become bloated and soft. A doughy gut hung over her belt, thick thighs pinched by the thigh high black stockings she wore beneath her boots. The black robe she wore barely covered her wobling backside, and did little to contain her swinging breasts, straining at the material even as they shook vicaiously with her motion. Sweat drenched her face as she grabbed onto a nearby outcrop to pull herself forward.

Johan sighed. It would take a while for her to reach him at this rate. Maybe he should give her a hand?
12.title: Leone

info.brief_description: One adventurer on a journey with an out of shape support
info.description:
Johan Klaus, greatsword-wielding warrior, will take on any quest. From monster-slaying, to escort duties, to gathering. He's a high ranking adventurer in the Republic of Ruxia, and he got there by being tough, strong, and agile. And his new companion.....somewhat less so.

After recognising the need for some support on longer quests, he managed to find a girl with the skills for the job. But healers aren't renowned for being physically sturdy.
